query.name: dsLossesRequestBrowseListByParamEx
query.sql:
SELECT #result('T.BENEFICIARID', 'java.lang.Long', 'BENEFICIARID'), #result('T.BIC', 'java.lang.String', 'BIC'), #result('T.BANKNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'BANKNAME'), #result('T.BKNUM', 'java.lang.String', 'BKNUM'), #result('T.CALCAMOUNT', 'java.lang.Double', 'CALCAMOUNT'), #result('T.CANCELCOMMENT', 'java.lang.String', 'CANCELCOMMENT'), #result('T.CANCELREASON', 'java.lang.String', 'CANCELREASON'), #result('T.CANCELREASONID', 'java.lang.Long', 'CANCELREASONID'), #result('T.CAUSES', 'java.lang.String', 'CAUSES'), #result('T.CONFIRMDOCS', 'java.lang.String', 'CONFIRMDOCS'), #result('T.CONTRID', 'java.lang.Long', 'CONTRID'), #result('T.CREATEUSERROLE', 'java.lang.String', 'CREATEUSERROLE'), #result('T.CULPRIT', 'java.lang.String', 'CULPRIT'), #result('T.CURACCOUNT', 'java.lang.String', 'CURACCOUNT'), #result('T.DECISIONCSKO', 'java.lang.Long', 'DECISIONCSKO'), #result('T.DECISIONSK', 'java.lang.Long', 'DECISIONSK'), #result('T.DECLARERID', 'java.lang.Long', 'DECLARERID'), #result('T.EVENTDATE', 'java.math.BigDecimal', 'EVENTDATE'), #result('T.FACEACCOUNT', 'java.lang.String', 'FACEACCOUNT'), #result('T.REQUESTID', 'java.lang.Long', 'REQUESTID'), #result('T.INN', 'java.lang.String', 'INN'), #result('T.INSOBJADDRESS', 'java.lang.String', 'INSOBJADDRESS'), #result('T.INSOBJNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'INSOBJNAME'), #result('T.INSOBJTYPE', 'java.lang.Long', 'INSOBJTYPE'), #result('T.INSURERID', 'java.lang.Long', 'INSURERID'), #result('T.ISOTHERINS', 'java.lang.Integer', 'ISOTHERINS'), #result('T.ISTHIRDPART', 'java.lang.Integer', 'ISTHIRDPART'), #result('T.ISNEEDINSPECT', 'java.lang.Integer', 'ISNEEDINSPECT'), #result('T.ISEMPTYDOCEXIST', 'java.lang.Integer', 'ISEMPTYDOCEXIST'), #result('T.KORACCOUNT', 'java.lang.String', 'KORACCOUNT'), #result('T.KPP', 'java.lang.String', 'KPP'), #result('T.LOSSES', 'java.lang.String', 'LOSSES'), #result('T.LOSSESAMOUNT', 'java.lang.Long', 'LOSSESAMOUNT'), #result('T.NAMEOTHERINS', 'java.lang.String', 'NAMEOTHERINS'), #result('T.REQUESTDATE', 'java.math.BigDecimal', 'REQUESTDATE'), #result('T.REQUESTNODEID', 'java.lang.Long', 'REQUESTNODEID'), #result('T.REQUESTNUM', 'java.lang.String', 'REQUESTNUM'), #result('T.TOTALAMOUNT', 'java.lang.Double', 'TOTALAMOUNT'), #result('T.VERNUMBER', 'java.math.BigDecimal', 'VERNUMBER'), #result('T.USERCOMMENT', 'java.lang.String', 'USERCOMMENT'), #result('T.USERCOMMENT2', 'java.lang.String', 'USERCOMMENT2'), #result('T.WHENWHOCLAIM', 'java.lang.String', 'WHENWHOCLAIM'), #result('T.STATEID', 'java.lang.Long', 'STATEID'), #result('STATE.PUBLICNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'STATENAME'), #result('STATE.SYSNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'STATESYSNAME'), #result('CONTR.CONTRNUM', 'java.lang.String', 'CONTRNUM'), #result('PERSON.NAME', 'java.lang.String', 'NAME'), #result('PERSON.MIDDLENAME', 'java.lang.String', 'MIDDLENAME'), #result('PERSON.SURNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'SURNAME') $ASPECTFIELDS FROM LOSS_REQUEST T INNER JOIN CORE_SM_STATE STATE ON (STATE.ID = T.STATEID) LEFT JOIN LOSS_CONTR CONTR ON (CONTR.CONTRID = T.CONTRID) LEFT JOIN LOSS_PERSON PERSON ON (PERSON.LOSSPERSONID = T.DECLARERID) $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($BENEFICIARID) T.BENEFICIARID = #bind($BENEFICIARID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($BIC) T.BIC = #bind($BIC 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($BANKNAME) T.BANKNAME = #bind($BANKNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($BKNUM) T.BKNUM = #bind($BKNUM 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CALCAMOUNT) T.CALCAMOUNT = #bind($CALCAMOUNT 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CANCELCOMMENT) T.CANCELCOMMENT = #bind($CANCELCOMMENT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CANCELREASON) T.CANCELREASON = #bind($CANCELREASON 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CANCELREASONID) T.CANCELREASONID = #bind($CANCELREASONID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CAUSES) T.CAUSES = #bind($CAUSES 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CONFIRMDOCS) T.CONFIRMDOCS = #bind($CONFIRMDOCS 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CONTRID) T.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CREATEUSERROLE) T.CREATEUSERROLE = #bind($CREATEUSERROLE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CULPRIT) T.CULPRIT = #bind($CULPRIT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CURACCOUNT) T.CURACCOUNT = #bind($CURACCOUNT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($DECISIONCSKO) T.DECISIONCSKO = #bind($DECISIONCSKO 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($DECISIONSK) T.DECISIONSK = #bind($DECISIONSK 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($DECLARERID) T.DECLARERID = #bind($DECLARERID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($EVENTDATE) T.EVENTDATE = #bind($EVENTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($FACEACCOUNT) T.FACEACCOUNT = #bind($FACEACCOUNT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INN) T.INN = #bind($INN 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INSOBJADDRESS) T.INSOBJADDRESS = #bind($INSOBJADDRESS 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INSOBJNAME) T.INSOBJNAME = #bind($INSOBJNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INSOBJTYPE) T.INSOBJTYPE = #bind($INSOBJTYPE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INSURERID) T.INSURERID = #bind($INSURERID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISOTHERINS) T.ISOTHERINS = #bind($ISOTHERINS 'INTEGER') #end #chunk($ISTHIRDPART) T.ISTHIRDPART = #bind($ISTHIRDPART 'INTEGER') #end #chunk($ISNEEDINSPECT) T.ISNEEDINSPECT = #bind($ISNEEDINSPECT 'INTEGER') #end #chunk($ISEMPTYDOCEXIST) T.ISEMPTYDOCEXIST = #bind($ISEMPTYDOCEXIST 'INTEGER') #end #chunk($KORACCOUNT) T.KORACCOUNT = #bind($KORACCOUNT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($KPP) T.KPP = #bind($KPP 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($LOSSES) T.LOSSES = #bind($LOSSES 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($LOSSESAMOUNT) T.LOSSESAMOUNT = #bind($LOSSESAMOUNT 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($NAMEOTHERINS) T.NAMEOTHERINS = #bind($NAMEOTHERINS 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($REQUESTDATE) T.REQUESTDATE = #bind($REQUESTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($REQUESTID) T.REQUESTID = #bind($REQUESTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($REQUESTNODEID) T.REQUESTNODEID = #bind($REQUESTNODEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($REQUESTNUM) T.REQUESTNUM = #bind($REQUESTNUM 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($TOTALAMOUNT) T.TOTALAMOUNT = #bind($TOTALAMOUNT 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($USERCOMMENT) T.USERCOMMENT = #bind($USERCOMMENT 'CLOB') #end #chunk($USERCOMMENT2) T.USERCOMMENT2 = #bind($USERCOMMENT2 'CLOB') #end #chunk($VERNUMBER) T.VERNUMBER = #bind($VERNUMBER 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($WHENWHOCLAIM) T.WHENWHOCLAIM = #bind($WHENWHOCLAIM 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CONTRNUM) UPPER(CONTR.CONTRNUM) LIKE UPPER('%$CONTRNUM%') #end #chunk($NAME) UPPER(PERSON.NAME) LIKE UPPER('%$NAME%') #end #chunk($MIDDLENAME) UPPER(PERSON.MIDDLENAME) LIKE UPPER('%$MIDDLENAME%') #end #chunk($SURNAME) UPPER(PERSON.SURNAME) LIKE UPPER('%$SURNAME%') #end #chunk($STARTREQUESTDATE) T.REQUESTDATE >= #bind($STARTREQUESTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($FINISHREQUESTDATE) T.REQUESTDATE <= #bind($FINISHREQUESTDATE 'FLOAT') #end
$ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsLossesRequestBrowseListByParamCountEx
query.sql: SELECT #result('COUNT($NEEDDISTINCT T.REQUESTID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') FROM LOSS_REQUEST T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($BENEFICIARID) T.BENEFICIARID = #bind($BENEFICIARID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($BIC) T.BIC = #bind($BIC 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($BANKNAME) T.BANKNAME = #bind($BANKNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($BKNUM) T.BKNUM = #bind($BKNUM 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CALCAMOUNT) T.CALCAMOUNT = #bind($CALCAMOUNT 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CANCELCOMMENT) T.CANCELCOMMENT = #bind($CANCELCOMMENT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CANCELREASON) T.CANCELREASON = #bind($CANCELREASON 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CANCELREASONID) T.CANCELREASONID = #bind($CANCELREASONID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CAUSES) T.CAUSES = #bind($CAUSES 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CONFIRMDOCS) T.CONFIRMDOCS = #bind($CONFIRMDOCS 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CONTRID) T.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CREATEUSERROLE) T.CREATEUSERROLE = #bind($CREATEUSERROLE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CULPRIT) T.CULPRIT = #bind($CULPRIT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CURACCOUNT) T.CURACCOUNT = #bind($CURACCOUNT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($DECISIONCSKO) T.DECISIONCSKO = #bind($DECISIONCSKO 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($DECISIONSK) T.DECISIONSK = #bind($DECISIONSK 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($DECLARERID) T.DECLARERID = #bind($DECLARERID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($EVENTDATE) T.EVENTDATE = #bind($EVENTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($FACEACCOUNT) T.FACEACCOUNT = #bind($FACEACCOUNT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INN) T.INN = #bind($INN 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INSOBJADDRESS) T.INSOBJADDRESS = #bind($INSOBJADDRESS 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INSOBJNAME) T.INSOBJNAME = #bind($INSOBJNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INSOBJTYPE) T.INSOBJTYPE = #bind($INSOBJTYPE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INSURERID) T.INSURERID = #bind($INSURERID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISOTHERINS) T.ISOTHERINS = #bind($ISOTHERINS 'INTEGER') #end #chunk($ISTHIRDPART) T.ISTHIRDPART = #bind($ISTHIRDPART 'INTEGER') #end #chunk($ISNEEDINSPECT) T.ISNEEDINSPECT = #bind($ISNEEDINSPECT 'INTEGER') #end #chunk($ISEMPTYDOCEXIST) T.ISEMPTYDOCEXIST = #bind($ISEMPTYDOCEXIST 'INTEGER') #end #chunk($KORACCOUNT) T.KORACCOUNT = #bind($KORACCOUNT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($KPP) T.KPP = #bind($KPP 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($LOSSES) T.LOSSES = #bind($LOSSES 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($LOSSESAMOUNT) T.LOSSESAMOUNT = #bind($LOSSESAMOUNT 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($NAMEOTHERINS) T.NAMEOTHERINS = #bind($NAMEOTHERINS 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($REQUESTDATE) T.REQUESTDATE = #bind($REQUESTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($REQUESTID) T.REQUESTID = #bind($REQUESTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($REQUESTNODEID) T.REQUESTNODEID = #bind($REQUESTNODEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($REQUESTNUM) T.REQUESTNUM = #bind($REQUESTNUM 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($TOTALAMOUNT) T.TOTALAMOUNT = #bind($TOTALAMOUNT 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($USERCOMMENT) T.USERCOMMENT = #bind($USERCOMMENT 'CLOB') #end #chunk($USERCOMMENT2) T.USERCOMMENT2 = #bind($USERCOMMENT2 'CLOB') #end #chunk($VERNUMBER) T.VERNUMBER = #bind($VERNUMBER 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($WHENWHOCLAIM) T.WHENWHOCLAIM = #bind($WHENWHOCLAIM 'VARCHAR') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsLossesRequestDocBrowseListByParamEx
query.sql: SELECT $NEEDDISTINCT #result('T.BINDOCID', 'java.lang.Long', 'BINDOCID'), #result('T.REQUESTDOCID', 'java.lang.Long', 'REQUESTDOCID'), #result('T.ISDOCCHECKING', 'java.lang.Integer', 'ISDOCCHECKING'), #result('T.ISORIGINALRECEIVED', 'java.lang.Integer', 'ISORIGINALRECEIVED'), #result('T.REQUESTID', 'java.lang.Long', 'REQUESTID'), #result('T2.NAME', 'java.lang.String', 'NAME'), #result('T2.NOTE', 'java.lang.String', 'NOTE'), #result('T3.FILENAME', 'java.lang.String', 'FILENAME'), #result('T3.BINFILEID', 'java.lang.Long', 'BINFILEID') $ASPECTFIELDS FROM LOSS_REQUESTDOC T LEFT JOIN LOSS_BINDOC T2 ON (T.BINDOCID = T2.BINDOCID) LEFT JOIN INS_BINFILE T3 ON (T3.OBJID = T.REQUESTDOCID) AND (T3.OBJTABLENAME = 'LOSS_REQUESTDOC') $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($BINDOCID) T.BINDOCID = #bind($BINDOCID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISDOCCHECKING) T.ISDOCCHECKING = #bind($ISDOCCHECKING 'INTEGER') #end #chunk($ISORIGINALRECEIVED) T.ISORIGINALRECEIVED = #bind($ISORIGINALRECEIVED 'INTEGER') #end #chunk($REQUESTDOCID) T.REQUESTDOCID = #bind($REQUESTDOCID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($REQUESTID) T.REQUESTID = #bind($REQUESTID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsLossRequestDocBrowseListByParamExCount
query.sql: SELECT #result('COUNT($NEEDDISTINCT T.REQUESTDOCID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') FROM LOSS_REQUESTDOC T LEFT JOIN LOSS_BINDOC T2 ON (T.BINDOCID = T2.BINDOCID) LEFT JOIN INS_BINFILE T3 ON (T3.OBJID = T.REQUESTDOCID) AND (T3.OBJTABLENAME = 'LOSS_REQUESTDOC') $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($BINDOCID) T.BINDOCID = #bind($BINDOCID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISDOCCHECKING) T.ISDOCCHECKING = #bind($ISDOCCHECKING 'INTEGER') #end #chunk($ISORIGINALRECEIVED) T.ISORIGINALRECEIVED = #bind($ISORIGINALRECEIVED 'INTEGER') #end #chunk($REQUESTDOCID) T.REQUESTDOCID = #bind($REQUESTDOCID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($REQUESTID) T.REQUESTID = #bind($REQUESTID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsLossesProductBinaryDocumentBrowseListByParamEx
query.sql: SELECT $NEEDDISTINCT #result('T.BINDOCID', 'java.lang.String', 'BINDOCID'), #result('T.BINDOCTYPE', 'java.lang.Long', 'BINDOCTYPE'), #result('T.REFUNDTYPEID', 'java.lang.Long', 'REFUNDTYPEID'), #result('T.CHECKNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'CHECKNAME'), #result('T.PRODBINDOCID', 'java.lang.Long', 'PRODBINDOCID'), #result('T.PRODID', 'java.lang.Long', 'PRODID'), #result('T.PRODKINDID', 'java.lang.Long', 'PRODKINDID'), #result('T.REQUIRED', 'java.lang.Boolean', 'REQUIRED'), #result('T2.NAME', 'java.lang.String', 'NAME'), #result('T2.NOTE', 'java.lang.String', 'NOTE') $ASPECTFIELDS FROM LOSS_PRODBINDOC T LEFT JOIN LOSS_BINDOC T2 ON (T.BINDOCID = T2.BINDOCID) $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($BINDOCID) T.BINDOCID = #bind($BINDOCID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($BINDOCTYPE) T.BINDOCTYPE = #bind($BINDOCTYPE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($REFUNDTYPEID) T.REFUNDTYPEID = #bind($REFUNDTYPEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CHECKNAME) T.CHECKNAME = #bind($CHECKNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PRODBINDOCID) T.PRODBINDOCID = #bind($PRODBINDOCID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($PRODID) T.PRODID = #bind($PRODID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($PRODKINDID) T.PRODKINDID = #bind($PRODKINDID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($REQUIRED) T.REQUIRED = #bind($REQUIRED 'BOOLEAN') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsLossesProductBinaryDocumentBrowseListByParamExCount
query.sql: SELECT #result('COUNT($NEEDDISTINCT T.PRODBINDOCID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') FROM LOSS_PRODBINDOC T LEFT JOIN LOSS_BINDOC T2 ON (T.BINDOCID = T2.BINDOCID) $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($BINDOCID) T.BINDOCID = #bind($BINDOCID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($BINDOCTYPE) T.BINDOCTYPE = #bind($BINDOCTYPE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($REFUNDTYPEID) T.REFUNDTYPEID = #bind($REFUNDTYPEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CHECKNAME) T.CHECKNAME = #bind($CHECKNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PRODBINDOCID) T.PRODBINDOCID = #bind($PRODBINDOCID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($PRODID) T.PRODID = #bind($PRODID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($PRODKINDID) T.PRODKINDID = #bind($PRODKINDID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($REQUIRED) T.REQUIRED = #bind($REQUIRED 'BOOLEAN') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsLossesProductReportBrowseListByParamEx
query.sql: SELECT $NEEDDISTINCT #result('T.PRODREPID', 'java.lang.Long', 'PRODREPID'), #result('T.NAME', 'java.lang.String', 'NAME'), #result('T.NOTE', 'java.lang.String', 'NOTE'), #result('T.POSTN', 'java.lang.Long', 'POSTN'), #result('T.PRODID', 'java.lang.Long', 'PRODID'), #result('T.PRODKINDID', 'java.lang.Long', 'PRODKINDID'), #result('T.CHECKID', 'java.lang.Long', 'CHECKID'), #result('T.REPID', 'java.lang.Long', 'REPID'), #result('T.REPTYPE', 'java.lang.Long', 'REPTYPE'), #result('T.RETURNPARTID', 'java.lang.Long', 'RETURNPARTID'), #result('T.RETURNREASONID', 'java.lang.Long', 'RETURNREASONID'), #result('T.EXPIRIED', 'java.lang.Long', 'EXPIRIED'), #result('T.EARLYREPAYMENT', 'java.lang.Long', 'EARLYREPAYMENT'), #result('T.RETURNTYPEID', 'java.lang.Long', 'RETURNTYPEID'), #result('T.CPNUM', 'java.lang.Long', 'CPNUM'), #result('T2.PAGEFLOWNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'PAGEFLOWNAME'), #result('T2.NAME', 'java.lang.String', 'REPNAME') $ASPECTFIELDS FROM LOSS_PRODREP T LEFT JOIN LOSS_REP T2 ON (T.REPID = T2.REPID) $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($CHECKID) T.CHECKID = #bind($CHECKID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CPNUM) T.CPNUM = #bind($CPNUM 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($NAME) T.NAME = #bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($NOTE) T.NOTE = #bind($NOTE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($POSTN) T.POSTN = #bind($POSTN 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($PRODID) T.PRODID = #bind($PRODID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($PRODKINDID) T.PRODKINDID = #bind($PRODKINDID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($PRODREPID) T.PRODREPID = #bind($PRODREPID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($REPID) T.REPID = #bind($REPID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($REPTYPE) T.REPTYPE = #bind($REPTYPE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($RETURNPARTID) T.RETURNPARTID = #bind($RETURNPARTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($RETURNREASONID) T.RETURNREASONID = #bind($RETURNREASONID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($EARLYREPAYMENT) T.EARLYREPAYMENT = #bind($EARLYREPAYMENT 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($EXPIRIED) T.EXPIRIED = #bind($EXPIRIED 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsLossesProductReportBrowseListByParamExCount
query.sql: SELECT #result('COUNT($NEEDDISTINCT T.PRODREPID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') FROM LOSS_PRODREP T LEFT JOIN LOSS_REP T2 ON (T.REPID = T2.REPID) $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($CHECKID) T.CHECKID = #bind($CHECKID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CPNUM) T.CPNUM = #bind($CPNUM 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($NAME) T.NAME = #bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($NOTE) T.NOTE = #bind($NOTE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($POSTN) T.POSTN = #bind($POSTN 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($PRODID) T.PRODID = #bind($PRODID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($PRODKINDID) T.PRODKINDID = #bind($PRODKINDID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($PRODREPID) T.PRODREPID = #bind($PRODREPID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($REPID) T.REPID = #bind($REPID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($REPTYPE) T.REPTYPE = #bind($REPTYPE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($RETURNPARTID) T.RETURNPARTID = #bind($RETURNPARTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($RETURNREASONID) T.RETURNREASONID = #bind($RETURNREASONID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($EARLYREPAYMENT) T.EARLYREPAYMENT = #bind($EARLYREPAYMENT 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($EXPIRIED) T.EXPIRIED = #bind($EXPIRIED 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsLossesRequestNACreateUserReset
query.sql: UPDATE T SET T.REQUESTID = #bind($REQUESTID 'NUMERIC'), T.CREATEUSERID = NULL FROM LOSS_REQUEST T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($REQUESTID) T.REQUESTID = #bind($REQUESTID 'NUMERIC') #end #end
UPDATE T SET T.REQUESTID = #bind($REQUESTID 'NUMERIC'), T.CREATEUSERID = NULL FROM LOSS_REQUEST T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($REQUESTID) T.REQUESTID = #bind($REQUESTID 'NUMERIC') #end #end
UPDATE LOSS_REQUEST T SET T.REQUESTID = #bind($REQUESTID 'NUMERIC'), T.CREATEUSERID = NULL #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($REQUESTID) T.REQUESTID = #bind($REQUESTID 'NUMERIC') #end #end

query.name: dsLossesRequestNodeNACreateUserReset
query.sql: UPDATE T SET T.REQUESTNODEID = #bind($REQUESTNODEID 'NUMERIC'), T.CREATEUSERID = NULL FROM LOSS_REQUESTNODE T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($REQUESTNODEID) T.REQUESTNODEID = #bind($REQUESTNODEID 'NUMERIC') #end #end

UPDATE T SET T.REQUESTNODEID = #bind($REQUESTNODEID 'NUMERIC'), T.CREATEUSERID = NULL FROM LOSS_REQUESTNODE T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($REQUESTNODEID) T.REQUESTNODEID = #bind($REQUESTNODEID 'NUMERIC') #end #end

UPDATE LOSS_REQUESTNODE T SET T.REQUESTNODEID = #bind($REQUESTNODEID 'NUMERIC'), T.CREATEUSERID = NULL #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($REQUESTNODEID) T.REQUESTNODEID = #bind($REQUESTNODEID 'NUMERIC') #end #end

query.name: dsLossesAddressBrowseListByParamEx
query.sql: SELECT $NEEDDISTINCT #result('T.ADDRESSSYSNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'ADDRESSSYSNAME'), #result('T.ADDRESSTEXT1', 'java.lang.String', 'ADDRESSTEXT1'), #result('T.ADDRESSTEXT2', 'java.lang.String', 'ADDRESSTEXT2'), #result('T.ADDRESSTEXT3', 'java.lang.String', 'ADDRESSTEXT3'), #result('T.BUILDING', 'java.lang.String', 'BUILDING'), #result('T.CITY', 'java.lang.String', 'CITY'), #result('T.CITYKLADR', 'java.lang.String', 'CITYKLADR'), #result('T.CITYTYPE', 'java.lang.Long', 'CITYTYPE'), #result('T.COUNTRY', 'java.lang.String', 'COUNTRY'), #result('T.DISTRICT', 'java.lang.String', 'DISTRICT'), #result('T.DISTRICTKLADR', 'java.lang.String', 'DISTRICTKLADR'), #result('T.DISTRICTTYPE', 'java.lang.Long', 'DISTRICTTYPE'), #result('T.FLAT', 'java.lang.String', 'FLAT'), #result('T.FLATTYPE', 'java.lang.String', 'FLATTYPE'), #result('T.HOUSE', 'java.lang.String', 'HOUSE'), #result('T.HOUSING', 'java.lang.String', 'HOUSING'), #result('T.ADDRESSID', 'java.lang.Long', 'ADDRESSID'), #result('T.ISINVALID', 'java.lang.Integer', 'ISINVALID'), #result('T.OBJID', 'java.lang.Long', 'OBJID'), #result('T.OBJSYSNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'OBJSYSNAME'), #result('T.PERMANENTLOCATIONFLAG', 'java.lang.Integer', 'PERMANENTLOCATIONFLAG'), #result('T.POSTALCODE', 'java.lang.String', 'POSTALCODE'), #result('T.PRIORITY', 'java.lang.Long', 'PRIORITY'), #result('T.REGION', 'java.lang.String', 'REGION'), #result('T.REGIONKLADR', 'java.lang.String', 'REGIONKLADR'), #result('T.REGIONTYPE', 'java.lang.Long', 'REGIONTYPE'), #result('T.REGISTRDATE', 'java.math.BigDecimal', 'REGISTRDATE'), #result('T.REGISTRTODATE', 'java.math.BigDecimal', 'REGISTRTODATE'), #result('T.STREET', 'java.lang.String', 'STREET'), #result('T.STREETKLADR', 'java.lang.String', 'STREETKLADR'), #result('T.STREETTYPE', 'java.lang.Long', 'STREETTYPE'), #result('T.USEKLADR', 'java.lang.Integer', 'USEKLADR'), #result('T.VILLAGE', 'java.lang.String', 'VILLAGE'), #result('T.VILLAGEKLADR', 'java.lang.String', 'VILLAGEKLADR'), #result('T3.FULLNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'STREETTYPE_FULL'), #result('T.VILLAGETYPE', 'java.lang.Long', 'VILLAGETYPE') $ASPECTFIELDS FROM LOSS_ADDRESS T LEFT JOIN CORE_KLADRSOCR T3 ON (T3.TYPECODE = T.STREETTYPE) $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($ADDRESSID) T.ADDRESSID = #bind($ADDRESSID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ADDRESSSYSNAME) T.ADDRESSSYSNAME = #bind($ADDRESSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($ADDRESSTEXT1) T.ADDRESSTEXT1 = #bind($ADDRESSTEXT1 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($ADDRESSTEXT2) T.ADDRESSTEXT2 = #bind($ADDRESSTEXT2 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($ADDRESSTEXT3) T.ADDRESSTEXT3 = #bind($ADDRESSTEXT3 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($BUILDING) T.BUILDING = #bind($BUILDING 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CITY) T.CITY = #bind($CITY 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CITYKLADR) T.CITYKLADR = #bind($CITYKLADR 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CITYTYPE) T.CITYTYPE = #bind($CITYTYPE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($COUNTRY) T.COUNTRY = #bind($COUNTRY 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($DISTRICT) T.DISTRICT = #bind($DISTRICT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($DISTRICTKLADR) T.DISTRICTKLADR = #bind($DISTRICTKLADR 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($DISTRICTTYPE) T.DISTRICTTYPE = #bind($DISTRICTTYPE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($FLAT) T.FLAT = #bind($FLAT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($FLATTYPE) T.FLATTYPE = #bind($FLATTYPE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($HOUSE) T.HOUSE = #bind($HOUSE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($HOUSING) T.HOUSING = #bind($HOUSING 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($ISINVALID) T.ISINVALID = #bind($ISINVALID 'INTEGER') #end #chunk($OBJID) T.OBJID = #bind($OBJID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($OBJSYSNAME) T.OBJSYSNAME = #bind($OBJSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PERMANENTLOCATIONFLAG) T.PERMANENTLOCATIONFLAG = #bind($PERMANENTLOCATIONFLAG 'INTEGER') #end #chunk($POSTALCODE) T.POSTALCODE = #bind($POSTALCODE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PRIORITY) T.PRIORITY = #bind($PRIORITY 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($REGION) T.REGION = #bind($REGION 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($REGIONKLADR) T.REGIONKLADR = #bind($REGIONKLADR 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($REGIONTYPE) T.REGIONTYPE = #bind($REGIONTYPE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($REGISTRDATE) T.REGISTRDATE = #bind($REGISTRDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($REGISTRTODATE) T.REGISTRTODATE = #bind($REGISTRTODATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STREET) T.STREET = #bind($STREET 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($STREETKLADR) T.STREETKLADR = #bind($STREETKLADR 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($STREETTYPE) T.STREETTYPE = #bind($STREETTYPE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($USEKLADR) T.USEKLADR = #bind($USEKLADR 'INTEGER') #end #chunk($VILLAGE) T.VILLAGE = #bind($VILLAGE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($VILLAGEKLADR) T.VILLAGEKLADR = #bind($VILLAGEKLADR 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($VILLAGETYPE) T.VILLAGETYPE = #bind($VILLAGETYPE 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsContractBrowseListForBorderoByParamEx
query.sql:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT #result('T.CONTRID', 'java.lang.Long', 'CONTRID'), #result('T.CONTRNUMBER', 'java.lang.String', 'CONTRNUMBER'), #result('T.DOCUMENTDATE', 'java.math.BigDecimal', 'DOCUMENTDATE'), #result('T2.SYSNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'STATESYSNAME'), #result('T2.PUBLICNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'STATENAME'), #result('T5.SELLERID', 'java.lang.Long', 'SELLERID'), #result('T5.NAME', 'java.lang.String', 'SELLERNAME'), #result('T4.DEPTSHORTNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'DEPTSHORTNAME') FROM INS_CONTR T INNER JOIN INS_CONTRNODE T3 ON (T3.CONTRID = T.CONTRID) INNER JOIN CORE_SM_STATE T2 ON (T.STATEID = T2.ID) LEFT JOIN DEP_DEPARTMENT T4 ON (T.ORGSTRUCTID = T4.DEPARTMENTID) LEFT JOIN INS_SELLER T5 ON (T.SELLERID = T5.SELLERID) LEFT JOIN INS_PRODVER T6 ON (T.PRODVERID = T6.PRODVERID) LEFT JOIN INS_PROD T7 ON (T6.PRODID = T7.PRODID) INNER JOIN INS_PAYFACT T8 ON (T8.CONTRNODEID = T.CONTRNODEID)
#chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($ISNOTINBORDERO) NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM INS_BORDEROCNT T6 WHERE T6.CONTRID = T.CONTRID) #end #chunk($DEPARTMENTID) T.ORGSTRUCTID = #bind($DEPARTMENTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CONTRNUMBER) UPPER(T.CONTRNUMBER) LIKE UPPER('%$CONTRNUMBER%') #end #chunk($SIGNSTARTDATE) TRUNC(T.SIGNDATE) >= #bind($SIGNSTARTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($SIGNFINISHDATE) TRUNC(T.SIGNDATE) <= #bind($SIGNFINISHDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($DOCSTARTDATE) TRUNC(T.DOCUMENTDATE) >= #bind($DOCSTARTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($DOCFINISHDATE) TRUNC(T.DOCUMENTDATE) <= #bind($DOCFINISHDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($PAYSTARTDATE) TRUNC(T8.PAYFACTDATE) >= #bind($PAYSTARTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($PAYFINISHDATE) TRUNC(T8.PAYFACTDATE) < #bind($PAYFINISHDATE 'FLOAT') and T8.payfactnumber != '111111111111' #end #chunk($PRODVERLIST) T.PRODVERID in (#bind($PRODVERLIST 'VARCHAR')) #end
#chunk($CONTRSTARTDATE) TRUNC(T.STARTDATE) >= #bind($CONTRSTARTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($CONTRFINISHDATE) TRUNC(T.STARTDATE) <= #bind($CONTRFINISHDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($SELLERNAME) UPPER(T5.NAME) LIKE UPPER('%$SELLERNAME%') #end #chunk($PRODNAME) UPPER(T7.NAME) LIKE UPPER('$PRODNAME') #end #chunk($PRODID) T6.PRODID = #bind($PRODID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($PRODVERID) T.PRODVERID = #bind($PRODVERID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($STATERESTRICT) T2.SYSNAME in ('INS_CONTRACT_SG', 'INS_CONTRACT_REJECT', 'INS_CONTRACT_ISSUED') #end #chunk($STATELIST) T2.SYSNAME in ($STATELIST) #end #chunk($STATESYSNAME) T2.SYSNAME = #bind($STATESYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #end order by T.CONTRID) #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($CONTRCOUNT) ROWNUM <= #bind($CONTRCOUNT 'NUMERIC') #end #end

query.name: dsContractBrowseListForBorderoByParamExCount
query.sql:
SELECT #result('COUNT(T.CONTRID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') FROM INS_CONTR T INNER JOIN INS_CONTRNODE T3 ON (T3.CONTRID = T.CONTRID) INNER JOIN CORE_SM_STATE T2 ON (T.STATEID = T2.ID) LEFT JOIN DEP_DEPARTMENT T4 ON (T.ORGSTRUCTID = T4.DEPARTMENTID) LEFT JOIN INS_SELLER T5 ON (T.SELLERID = T5.SELLERID) LEFT JOIN INS_PRODVER T6 ON (T.PRODVERID = T6.PRODVERID) LEFT JOIN INS_PROD T7 ON (T6.PRODID = T7.PRODID) INNER JOIN INS_PAYFACT T8 ON (T8.CONTRNODEID = T.CONTRNODEID)
#chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($ISNOTINBORDERO) NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM INS_BORDEROCNT T6 WHERE T6.CONTRID = T.CONTRID) #end #chunk($DEPARTMENTID) T.ORGSTRUCTID = #bind($DEPARTMENTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CONTRNUMBER) UPPER(T.CONTRNUMBER) LIKE UPPER('%$CONTRNUMBER%') #end #chunk($SIGNSTARTDATE) TRUNC(T.SIGNDATE) >= #bind($SIGNSTARTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($SIGNFINISHDATE) TRUNC(T.SIGNDATE) <= #bind($SIGNFINISHDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($DOCSTARTDATE) TRUNC(T.DOCUMENTDATE) >= #bind($DOCSTARTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($DOCFINISHDATE) TRUNC(T.DOCUMENTDATE) <= #bind($DOCFINISHDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($PAYSTARTDATE) TRUNC(T8.PAYFACTDATE) >= #bind($PAYSTARTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($PAYFINISHDATE) TRUNC(T8.PAYFACTDATE) < #bind($PAYFINISHDATE 'FLOAT') and T8.payfactnumber != '111111111111' #end #chunk($PRODVERLIST) T.PRODVERID in (#bind($PRODVERLIST 'VARCHAR')) #end
#chunk($CONTRSTARTDATE) TRUNC(T.STARTDATE) >= #bind($CONTRSTARTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($CONTRFINISHDATE) TRUNC(T.STARTDATE) <= #bind($CONTRFINISHDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($SELLERNAME) UPPER(T5.NAME) LIKE UPPER('%$SELLERNAME%') #end #chunk($PRODNAME) UPPER(T7.NAME) LIKE UPPER('$PRODNAME') #end #chunk($PRODID) T6.PRODID = #bind($PRODID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($PRODVERID) T.PRODVERID = #bind($PRODVERID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($STATERESTRICT) T2.SYSNAME in ('INS_CONTRACT_SG', 'INS_CONTRACT_REJECT', 'INS_CONTRACT_ISSUED') #end #chunk($STATELIST) T2.SYSNAME in ($STATELIST) #end #chunk($STATESYSNAME) T2.SYSNAME = #bind($STATESYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #end

query.name: dsInsClientActionLogBrowseListByParamEx
query.sql: SELECT $NEEDDISTINCT #result('T.ACTION', 'java.lang.String', 'ACTION'), #result('T.CLIENTACTLOGID', 'java.lang.Long', 'CLIENTACTLOGID'), #result('T.CLIENTACTLOGTYPEID', 'java.lang.Long', 'CLIENTACTLOGTYPEID'), #result('T.NOTE', 'java.lang.String', 'NOTE'), #result('T.PARAM1', 'java.lang.String', 'PARAM1'), #result('T.PARAM2', 'java.lang.String', 'PARAM2'), #result('T.PARAM3', 'java.lang.String', 'PARAM3'), #result('T.PARAM4', 'java.lang.String', 'PARAM4'), #result('T.PARAM5', 'java.lang.String', 'PARAM5'), #result('T.RAWDATA', 'java.lang.String', 'RAWDATA'), #result('T.TABLENAME', 'java.lang.String', 'TABLENAME'), #result('T.SESSIONID', 'java.lang.String', 'SESSIONID'), #result('T.CREATEDATE', 'java.math.BigDecimal', 'CREATEDATE'), #result('T2.CONTRNUMBER', 'java.lang.String', 'CONTRNUMBER'), #result('T6.NAME', 'java.lang.String', 'ACTIONNAME'), #result('T.VALUE', 'java.lang.String', 'VALUE') $ASPECTFIELDS FROM INS_CLIENTACTLOG T LEFT JOIN INS_CONTREXT T1 ON (T.SESSIONID = T1.STRINGFIELD05) LEFT JOIN INS_CONTR T2 ON (T1.CONTRID = T2.CONTRID) LEFT JOIN INS_PRODCONF T3 ON ((T2.PRODVERID = T3.PRODVERID) AND (T3.SYSNAME = 'POS')) LEFT JOIN INS_PRODVER T4 ON (T4.PRODVERID = T2.PRODVERID) LEFT JOIN INS_PROD T5 ON (T4.PRODID = T5.PRODID) LEFT JOIN INS_CLIENTACTLOGTYPE T6 ON (T6.SYSNAME = T.ACTION) $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($CONTRNUMBER) UPPER(T2.CONTRNUMBER) LIKE UPPER('%$CONTRNUMBER%') #end #chunk($ACTION) T.ACTION = #bind($ACTION 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CLIENTACTLOGID) T.CLIENTACTLOGID = #bind($CLIENTACTLOGID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CLIENTACTLOGTYPEID) T.CLIENTACTLOGTYPEID = #bind($CLIENTACTLOGTYPEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($NOTE) T.NOTE = #bind($NOTE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PARAM1) T.PARAM1 = #bind($PARAM1 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PARAM2) T.PARAM2 = #bind($PARAM2 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PARAM3) T.PARAM3 = #bind($PARAM3 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PARAM4) T.PARAM4 = #bind($PARAM4 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PARAM5) T.PARAM5 = #bind($PARAM5 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($TABLENAME) T.TABLENAME = #bind($TABLENAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SESSIONID) T.SESSIONID = #bind($SESSIONID 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($VALUE) T.VALUE = #bind($VALUE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CONTRID) T2.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRID 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PRODVERID) T2.PRODVERID = #bind($PRODVERID 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PRODCONFID) T3.PRODCONFID = #bind($PRODCONFID 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PRODID) T5.PRODID = #bind($PRODID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CREATESTARTDATE) T.CREATEDATE >= #bind($CREATESTARTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($CREATEFINISHDATE) T.CREATEDATE <= #bind($CREATEFINISHDATE 'FLOAT') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsInsClientActionLogBrowseListByParamExCount
query.sql: SELECT #result('COUNT($NEEDDISTINCT T.CLIENTACTLOGID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') FROM INS_CLIENTACTLOG T LEFT JOIN INS_CONTREXT T1 ON (T.SESSIONID = T1.STRINGFIELD05) LEFT JOIN INS_CONTR T2 ON (T1.CONTRID = T2.CONTRID) LEFT JOIN INS_PRODCONF T3 ON ((T2.PRODVERID = T3.PRODVERID) AND (T3.SYSNAME = 'POS')) LEFT JOIN INS_PRODVER T4 ON (T4.PRODVERID = T2.PRODVERID) LEFT JOIN INS_PROD T5 ON (T4.PRODID = T5.PRODID) LEFT JOIN INS_CLIENTACTLOGTYPE T6 ON (T6.SYSNAME = T.ACTION) $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($CONTRNUMBER) UPPER(T2.CONTRNUMBER) LIKE UPPER('%$CONTRNUMBER%') #end #chunk($ACTION) T.ACTION = #bind($ACTION 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CLIENTACTLOGID) T.CLIENTACTLOGID = #bind($CLIENTACTLOGID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CLIENTACTLOGTYPEID) T.CLIENTACTLOGTYPEID = #bind($CLIENTACTLOGTYPEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($NOTE) T.NOTE = #bind($NOTE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PARAM1) T.PARAM1 = #bind($PARAM1 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PARAM2) T.PARAM2 = #bind($PARAM2 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PARAM3) T.PARAM3 = #bind($PARAM3 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PARAM4) T.PARAM4 = #bind($PARAM4 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PARAM5) T.PARAM5 = #bind($PARAM5 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($TABLENAME) T.TABLENAME = #bind($TABLENAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SESSIONID) T.SESSIONID = #bind($SESSIONID 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($VALUE) T.VALUE = #bind($VALUE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($CONTRID) T2.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRID 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PRODVERID) T2.PRODVERID = #bind($PRODVERID 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PRODCONFID) T3.PRODCONFID = #bind($PRODCONFID 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PRODID) T5.PRODID = #bind($PRODID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CREATESTARTDATE) T.CREATEDATE >= #bind($CREATESTARTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($CREATEFINISHDATE) T.CREATEDATE <= #bind($CREATEFINISHDATE 'FLOAT') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsInsClientActionLogTypeBrowseListByParamEx
query.sql: SELECT $NEEDDISTINCT #result('T.CLIENTACTLOGTYPEID', 'java.lang.Long', 'CLIENTACTLOGTYPEID'), #result('T.NAME', 'java.lang.String', 'NAME'), #result('T.SYSNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'SYSNAME') $ASPECTFIELDS FROM INS_CLIENTACTLOGTYPE T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($CLIENTACTLOGTYPEID) T.CLIENTACTLOGTYPEID = #bind($CLIENTACTLOGTYPEID 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($NAME) T.NAME = #bind($PARAM2 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SYSNAME) T.SYSNAME = #bind($SYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end
